sn47.20:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sumbhesu viharati sedakaṃ nāma sumbhānaṃ nigamo.
sn47.20:5.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ‘janapadakalyāṇī, janapadakalyāṇī’ti kho, bhikkhave, mahājanakāyo sannipateyya.
sn47.20:5.2: ‘Sā kho panassa janapadakalyāṇī paramapāsāvinī nacce, paramapāsāvinī gīte.
sn47.20:5.3: Janapadakalyāṇī naccati gāyatī’ti kho, bhikkhave, bhiyyoso mattāya mahājanakāyo sannipateyya.
sn47.20:5.4: Atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitukāmo amaritukāmo sukhakāmo dukkhappaṭikūlo.
sn47.20:5.6: ‘ayaṃ te, ambho purisa, samatittiko telapatto antarena ca mahāsamajjaṃ antarena ca janapadakalyāṇiyā pariharitabbo.
sn47.20:5.7: Puriso ca te ukkhittāsiko piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhissati.
sn47.20:5.8: Yattheva naṃ thokampi chaḍḍessati tattheva te siro pātessatī’ti.
sn47.20:5.9: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, api nu so puriso amuṃ telapattaṃ amanasikaritvā bahiddhā pamādaṃ āhareyyā”ti?
sn47.20:6.1: “Upamā kho myāyaṃ, bhikkhave, katā atthassa viññāpanāya.
sn47.20:6.3: samatittiko telapattoti kho, bhikkhave, kāyagatāya etaṃ satiyā adhivacanaṃ.
sn47.20:6.5: ‘kāyagatā sati no bhāvitā bhavissati bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā’ti.
